description: Displays information about the certificate registered for secure LDAP or client certificate authentication.

nested_items.name: Certificate
nested_items.description: Information about the certificate, including registered date time, certificate state, the reason for the state, expiration date time, and certificate common name.

nested_items.name: StateReason
nested_items.description: Describes a state change for the certificate.

nested_items.name: CommonName
nested_items.description: The common name for the certificate.

nested_items.name: RegisteredDateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time that the certificate was registered.

nested_items.name: ExpiryDateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time when the certificate will expire.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The function that the registered certificate performs. Valid values include ClientLDAPS or ClientCertAuth. The default value is ClientLDAPS.

nested_items.name: ClientCertAuthSettings
nested_items.description: A ClientCertAuthSettings object that contains client certificate authentication settings.

nested_items.name: OCSPUrl
nested_items.description: Specifies the URL of the default OCSP server used to check for revocation status. A secondary value to any OCSP address found in the AIA extension of the user certificate.
